name: Milla and the Demon King Alpha Demo
name_original: Milla and the Demon King Alpha Demo
description:
Milla and the Demon King is a solo-developed metroidvania game made in Unity. 

This demo contains the introductory mission of the game, including a demonstration of enemies, NPC's, quest items and the save system. 

Sound, player upgrade trees, map screen and EXP system have not been implemented. Some unfinished NPC's, interactions and buildings are also excluded from this demo.

Mac version is untested.

Known rare bugs include camera positioning inconsistencies during cutscenes and other scripted camera transitions. Player movement over uneven terrain can also be inconsistent.
